etymologies: mid 17th century: from Portuguese cobra de capello, literally ‘snake with hood’, based on Latin colubra ‘snake’

definitions: a highly venomous snake native to Africa and Asia that spreads the skin of its neck into a hood when disturbed.

notes.text: Naja and two other genera, family Elapidae: several species, in particular the king cobra and the spectacled cobra

shortDefinitions: highly venomous African or Asian snake that spreads skin of its neck into hood when disturbed

definitions: a yoga pose assumed by lying on one's stomach and raising one's upper body so as to curve it backwards, using one's arms and hands for support

examples.text: drop the pelvis and arch the back into cobra

shortDefinitions: yoga pose assumed by lying on stomach and raising upper body
